item.title: Oracle Certified Associate Java PG
item.author: celine
item.description: OCAJP 紀錄題目的地方… 1. Hello Java public class HelloJava { public static void main(String[] args) { StringBuilder message = new StringBuilder("hello java!"); int pos = 0; try { for (pos = 0; pos < 12; pos++) { switch (message.charAt(pos)) { case 'a': case 'e': case 'o': String uc = Character.toString(message.charAt(pos)).toUpperCase(); message.replace(pos, pos + 1, uc); } } } catch (Exception e) { System.out.println("Out of limits"); } System.out.println(message); } } Out of limits

item.title: [NEW] OCP Java PG
item.author: celine
item.description: JDK 11 New OCPJP 沒意外的話應該會考1Z0-819，雖然沒什麼人考但是版本比較新 🛰

item.title: Oracle Certified Professional Java PG
item.author: celine
item.description: OCPJP pro to be or else … no else 1. Regional Inner Class public class Vehicle { int distance; Vehicle(int x) { this.distance = x; } public void increSpeed(int time) { int timeTravel = time; class Car { // line n1 int value = 0; public void speed() { value = distance / timeTravel; // line n2 System.out.println("Velocity with new speed " + value + " kmph"); } } new Car().

item.title: // Reading club
item.author: celine
item.description: // Reading club 想要參加但是怕題目重複所以在這裡放歷史紀錄 阿里斯 郭歐烏 帖伊特 乎阿米 湍梯玩 費德生 書寫修復練習 v 超級思維 v 我們所能承擔的，多過我們所能想像 v 研究室：談一場不追不求 v 神啊！我不想再努力了，請直接告訴我成功的方法吧 v In-dis-tractable 專注力協定 v Designing Your Life 做自己的生命設計師 v 最高學以致用法 v 活出意義來 v 最高閒聊法 v The Bullet Journal Method — 子彈思考整理術 v 深夜加油站．遇見蘇格拉底 v 蛤蟆先生去看心理師 v

item.title: See primer plus
item.author: celine
item.description: 成為 C++ pro 的幾個建議（摘錄自 Big Sam Tsai） Read good C++ textbooks again and again Learn from practice Work in related field Right mentor Make learning thoughts public At least three years 這樣看來我能做到的有 1. 2. 5. 6. ，4. 的話可以抓親友充數 Chapter 2 宣告敘述與變數 #include <iostream> // a PREPROCESSOR directive /* a C-style comment */ int main() { // function header { start of function body using namespace std; // make difinitions visible cout << "Come up and C++ me some time.

item.title: Secondpost
item.author: celine
item.description: This is the second post. 在 double short codes 裡面寫 markdown 語法不管用， 如果要加 markdown 語法的話，要把 {{< >}} 改成 {{% %}} **Testing doubly short code.** Testing doubly short code. short code

item.title: Firstpost
item.author: celine
item.description: Front matter - meta data about this piece of data key-value pairs that gives us information about this file can be written in three languages: yaml, toml, json default language for front matter is yaml What does a toml-style front matter look like? +++ title = "FirstPost" date = YYYY-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss draft = true +++ versus a yaml-style front matter --- title: "firstPost" date: YYYY-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss draft: true --- Create custom front matter such as
